summary: Artist promotional website draft for singer/songwriter JensyPragya (pop/kpop) including bio, location, upcoming album, and YouTube link.
architectural_notes: Site content should include: artist name JensyPragya, singer/songwriter, emerging pop/kpop artist, based in New Delhi, upcoming album "Don't Care", and a YouTube presence (name JensyPragya + link).

existing_features.title: Replace the placeholder artist identity content with JensyPragya details across the site by updating the central content source (frontend/src/content/artistContent.ts) to reflect: JensyPragya (name), singer and songwriter, emerging pop/kpop artist, currently living in New Delhi, and upcoming album title "Don't Care". Ensure all displayed copy remains in English.

Update the Videos section content to include the user-provided YouTube video link by configuring artistContent.videos to embed the YouTube video with ID "X6QUk9-Qw1c" and set the artist YouTube social link to the exact provided URL https://youtu.be/X6QUk9-Qw1c?si=h4FpM3omCMSQQiSA.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a draft personal artist website for JensyPragya (singer/songwriter, pop/kpop) including bio, New Delhi location, upcoming album "Don't Care", and YouTube channel/link https://youtu.be/X6QUk9-Qw1c?si=h4FpM3omCMSQQiSA
